verbose_text: In the first study concerning plant recombinant Nef, a panel of constructs were designed to direct the expression of full-length N-terminal myristoylated (p27), non myristoylated (p27 mut) and truncated form (p25) of Nef, to either the cytosol or the secretory pathway.
evidence: expression of full-length N-terminal myristoylated (p27), non-myristoylated (p27 mut
